name: Home (itch) (alekcylwik)
description:
Description:

Guppy the fish and pincher the crab need to make their way back home. Each player has different abilities they can use to complete each puzzle. Help them complete each puzzle to make their way back home.

Controls:

Directional Movement: WASD Keys/ Arrow Keys

Action: X Key

Skip Text: Enter Key/X Key/Spacebar Key

Mechanics:

Guppy Abilities:

  • Swim through tight spaces
  • Access Buttons
  • Push Blue X's

Pincher Abilities:

  • Break Kelp
  • Move Red X's

Tips:

  • Press X Key when Guppy is on button to open doors
  • Blue X's can move through kelp
  • Blue X's can remove jellyfish

Win Conditions:

  • Guppy must be on the blue rectangle
  • Pincher must be on the red rectangle
